newsitem.title: USA: North American Resorts says to be bought.
newsitem.headline: North American Resorts says to be bought.

text.p: North American Resorts Inc said it has entered into an agreement to be acquired St. Anthony Entertainment Inc for a combination of stock and royalites equalling $0.15 per share, or approximately $8 million.
The transaction is subject to St. Anthony completing its move to become a publicly-reporting company within 90 days and is subject to share holder approval of both companies, it said.
